mapper.select: SELECT DLR_CD , FINC_CMP_CD , FINC_ITEM_CD , FINC_ITEM_NM , FINC_ITEM_TP , FINC_ITEM_PRID , CREDIT_GRADE_CD , CUST_TP , CONTRACT_AMT , PREPAY_RATE , PREPAY_DL_AMT , LATEPAY_DL_AMT , CASH_PRC , MM_PAY_AMT_RATE , REM_INTR_RATE , INST_INTR_RATE , HDLG_FEE_RATE , HDLG_FEE_AMT , GRTE_INCA_RATE , GRTE_INC_AMT , STAMP_AMT , AUTH_AMT , INST_SBODT_AMT , BP_CD , CONTRACT_AMT_RATE , USE_YN , FINC_ITEM_KIND_CD , REG_USR_ID , REG_DT , UPDT_USR_ID , UPDT_DT FROM SA_0117T WHERE DLR_CD = #{dlrCd} AND FINC_CMP_CD = #{fincCmpCd} AND FINC_ITEM_CD = #{fincItemCd}

/* [chn.bhmc.dms.sal.bsc.service.dao.FinancialProductsManagementDAO.selectFincTargetModelSearchsByCondition] */ SELECT A.DLR_CD --딜러코드 , A.FINC_CMP_CD , A.FINC_ITEM_CD , A.MODEL_CD --모델코드 , FN_GET_MODEL_NM(A.MODEL_CD) AS MODEL_NM , A.REG_USR_ID --등록자ID , A.REG_DT --등록일자 , A.UPDT_USR_ID --수정자ID , A.UPDT_DT --수정일자 FROM SA_0174T A /* 금융상품대상모델 */ WHERE A.DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} AND A.FINC_CMP_CD = #{sFincCmpCd} AND A.FINC_ITEM_CD = #{sFincItemCd} ORDER BY
A.MODEL_CD ASCDESC MODEL_NM ASCDESC
A.DLR_CD ASC, A.FINC_CMP_CD ASC, A.FINC_ITEM_CD ASC, A.MODEL_CD ASC
A.DLR_CD ASC, A.FINC_CMP_CD ASC, A.FINC_ITEM_CD ASC, A.MODEL_CD ASC

SELECT A.FINC_CMP_CD , A.FINC_ITEM_CD , A.FINC_ITEM_NM , A.INST_INTR_RATE , A.GRTE_INC_AMT , A.HDLG_FEE_AMT FROM SA_0117T A INNER JOIN SA_0174T B ON A.DLR_CD = B.DLR_CD AND A.FINC_CMP_CD = B.FINC_CMP_CD AND A.FINC_ITEM_CD = B.FINC_ITEM_CD WHERE A.DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} AND A.FINC_ITEM_KIND_CD = '02' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.MODEL_CD = #{sModelCd} ORDER BY A.FINC_CMP_CD ASC, A.FINC_ITEM_CD ASC
